bilingual.source: OK, please pay attention for a moment!
I must pay attention to the traffic lights!
bilingual.target: 我必须注意交通信号灯！

bilingual.source: You must pay attention to the traffic lights.
bilingual.target: 你必须注意交通信号灯。

bilingual.source: I hope you will pay attention to what I say.
bilingual.target: 我希望你会注意我说的话。

bilingual.source: He did not pay attention to where he was going.
bilingual.target: 他没有注意他要去的地方。

bilingual.source: Pay attention to the sounds of the letter groups in bold.
bilingual.target: 注意粗体字母组合的发音。

list.abstract: 《Attention》是一首由美国歌手Charlie Puth演唱的英语流行歌曲。由Jacob Kasher、Charlie Puth作词作曲，收录在Charlie Puth于2017年4月21日发行的同名专辑《Attention》中，后又收录于他的第二张录音室专辑《Voicenotes》中。 《Attention》是普斯的第五首RIAA认证白金单曲，第三首美国公告牌单曲榜前10（最高位第5名），第二首Hot AC 电台独唱冠军单曲，第一首Hot AC 电台独唱冠军单曲。Attention被《纽约时报》评为2017年度最佳歌曲之一。
Tokio Hotel是风靡欧美的德国摇滚乐队。主音和吉他手是一对双胞胎。出道单曲Durch den Monsun曾经位居德国排行榜第1名。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention, all initiates report for final testing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请注意，所有新成员，来最终测验报道。

yingyinNormal.en: They certainly know how to take advantage of media attention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们懂得如何利用媒体注意。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention. Return to start positions. Return to start positions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意，回到初始位置，回到初始位置。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention, all S.H.I.E.L.D agents. This is Steve Rogers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 神盾局全体特工请注意，我是史蒂夫罗杰斯。

yingyinNormal.en: Pay attention, Leonard. That's why she can't play on Sunday.
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意力集中点，莱纳德。这是她周日不能来的原因。

yingyinNormal.en: That's just so we don't draw attention to the congressional race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只是为了不让国会竞选吸引太多注意。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't seem to get her attention. Or even say the right thing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我似乎无法引起她的注意，甚至都没法把话说对。

yingyinNormal.en: It's gotta be a killer app to get the attention of the right people.
yingyinNormal.zh: 必须是杀手级应用软件才能吸引到目标人士的注意。

yingyinNormal.en: And no one's paying attention. No one is paying attention. Because the banks are too busy getting paid obscene fees to sell these bonds.
yingyinNormal.zh: 没有人会注意到，没有人在意，因为银行正忙着卖这些债券好赚黑心钱。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention, everyone. We have an announcement. Jaws Theta Chi has been disqualified.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家注意，我们有事宣布，猛将会取消资格。

yingyinNormal.en: Kevin! Kevin! Kevin Kevin Kev... Hey, Kevin. Hey. Ow. Hey. Pay attention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 凯文！凯文，凯文...嘿，凯文。嘿。哦。嘿，注意听。

yingyinNormal.en: Can I have your attention, everyone? That's, B-flat, for those who don't have perfect pitch.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大家请注意，给没有绝对音感的人，这是降B调。

yingyinNormal.en: It's come to our attention that you've transported toxic chemicals through the U.S. Postal Service.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们注意到你通过邮政部门运送了有毒化学品。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, everyone pay attention. Yes, I have a friend named Amy Farrah Fowler.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，各单位注意，没错，我是有个朋友叫艾米·菲拉·福勒。

yingyinNormal.en: You're not listening. Why is nobody listening to me when I talk? Are you paying attention?
yingyinNormal.zh: 你们没在听，为什么没人听我说话？你们有注意听吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Good morning. If I could have everyone's attention, please? I know we're all eager to get on the road to Big Sur.
yingyinNormal.zh: 早上好，大家请注意？我知道我们都想尽快开往大苏。

yingyinNormal.en: Welcome to the Astronaut Candidate Program. Now pay attention, because this could save your life.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎来到宇航员预备计划，现在请注意听, 因为可能会救你一命。

yingyinNormal.en: Attention, Matthews family and Freako Morgenstern! We need to teach Maya the meaning of Christmas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 注意了，马修斯一家和怪人摩根斯，我们要教会玛雅圣诞节的意义。

yingyinNormal.en: He gave me a mug. What do you think I'm drinking out of? Do you even pay attention? Honestly, less and less.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他有送我杯子。不然我在用什么喝水？你都有注意人家吗？老实说，越来越少了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, do go on. People spend all this money to have their daughters basically dance in front of others for attention.
yingyinNormal.zh: 请继续说。人们花那么多钱来养一个女儿就是为了在别人面前跳舞而引起注意。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: interest that people show in someone or something

examination_example.sentence: It failed to pay due <highlight>attention</highlight> to patients' rights.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它没有对病人的权利给予应有的重视。

examination_example.sentence: Second, it is surely a good thing that the money and <highlight>attention</highlight> come to science rather than go elsewhere.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其次，钱和注意力都投向科学而不是其他领域，这肯定是一件好事。

examination_example.sentence: Global challenges and social innovation ought to receive much more <highlight>attention</highlight> from scientists, especially the young ones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全球挑战和社会创新应该得到科学家，尤其是年轻科学家的更多关注。

sense_info_list.en: the action of dealing with or taking special care of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: Stay alert to serious symptoms, such as chest pain, severe shortness of breath or dizziness, or faintness, and seek medical <highlight>attention</highlight> immediately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 对严重症状保持警惕，如胸痛、严重气短、头晕或昏厥，并立即就医。

word_usage.usage: attention表示“注意；专心；专注“时，为不可数名词，不与a/an连用，也没有复数形式，如：pay attention to sb./sth. 注意某人/某物；表示“殷勤，关心“时，为可数名词，一般用复数形式，如：unwanted attentions of strangers 来自陌生人多余的关心。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸引注意力；吸引关注；引起注意

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 关注；注意；关心；照料；立正；注意力；殷勤

word_family.mean: adj. 注意的；专心的；体贴的；有礼貌的；无微不至的

sense_info_list.en: the action of dealing with or taking special care of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: By fifth grade, children with early <highlight>attention</highlight> difficulties had lower grades and reading achievement scores than their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到五年级时，早期注意力集中困难的孩子的成绩和阅读成就分数都比同龄人低。

examination_example.sentence: They found that early <highlight>attention</highlight> skills were the most consistent predictor of academic success.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们发现，早期的注意力技能是学业成功的最稳定的预测因素。

examination_example.sentence: Snapping a photo directs <highlight>attention</highlight>, which heightens the pleasure you get from whatever you're looking at, Diehl says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Diehl 说，拍照可以吸引人们的注意力，这可以使你从正在看的任何事物中获得更大乐趣。

sense_info_list.en: interest that people show in someone or something

examination_example.sentence: They may be groundless and fictitious just to catch people's <highlight>attention</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们可能是毫无根据和虚构的，只是为了吸引人们的注意。

examination_example.sentence: It's expected to be worth over $50 billion and generate 160 gigawatt-hours, enough to attract the <highlight>attention</highlight> of major companies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的价值将超过500亿美元，发电量将达1600亿瓦，足以吸引那些大公司的注意。

word_usage.usage: attention在表示“注意”时，为不可数名词。用作可数名词时，指具体活动，表示“殷勤”“关心”，多用复数形式。
表示“注意某人或某事”，可用固定搭配pay attention to。to为介词，其后可直接加宾语，也可加动名词。

表示“要某人注意某事”，可用call/draw one's attention to sth 或call sth to one's attention；表示“用某事引起某人的注意”时，用bring the matter to one's attention。两者不可调换使用。
正 He wants to call her attention to the matter.
误 He wants to bring her attention to the matter.

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 医疗照顾；医疗关注；医学关注

sense_info_list.en: the action of dealing with or taking special care of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: They turned public <highlight>attention</highlight> away from the health risks of sugar to fat.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们把公众的注意力从糖的健康风险转移到脂肪上。

examination_example.sentence: They want to attract <highlight>attention</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们想引起注意。

examination_example.sentence: Each artist has their own individual style but all artists share a common aim: to draw <highlight>attention</highlight> to the pollution in our cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每位艺术家都有自己的风格，但所有艺术家都有一个共同的目标：引起人们对城市污染的关注。

sense_info_list.en: interest that people show in someone or something

examination_example.sentence: The issue of the stresses felt by students in elite school districts has gained <highlight>attention</highlight> in recent years as schools in places like Newton, Massachusetts, and Palo Alto have reported a number of suicides.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着马萨诸塞州牛顿市(Newton，Massachusetts)和帕罗奥多(Palo Alto)等地的学校报告了多起学生自杀事件，许多知名学区的学生备受压力一事近年来得到关注。

examination_example.sentence: Recognizing problems early and seeking medical <highlight>attention</highlight> is important.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 及早发现问题并寻求医疗护理很重要。

word_usage.usage: attention在表示“注意”时，为不可数名词。用作可数名词时，指具体活动，表示“殷勤”“关心”，多用复数形式。

表示“要某人注意某事”，可用call/draw one's attention to sth 或call sth to one's attention；表示“用某事引起某人的注意”时，用bring the matter to one's attention。两者不可调换使用。
正 He wants to call her attention to the matter.
误 He wants to bring her attention to the matter.
表示“注意某人或某事”，可用固定搭配pay attention to。to为介词，其后可直接加宾语，也可加动名词。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸引注意力；吸引关注；引起注意

sense_info_list.en: interest that people show in someone or something

examination_example.sentence: We hope that such <highlight>attention</highlight> will excite a greater interest in the scientific and scholarly study of emotion.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们希望这种关注将激发人们对情感的科学和学术研究的更大兴趣。

examination_example.sentence: Drawing public <highlight>attention</highlight> to plastic waste.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 引起公众对塑料垃圾的关注。引起公众对塑料垃圾的关注。

examination_example.sentence: The post has since gained the <highlight>attention</highlight> of social media users all over the world.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这条帖子引起了全世界社交媒体用户的关注。

sense_info_list.en: the action of dealing with or taking special care of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: He had my full <highlight>attention</highlight> and I had his.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他让我全神贯注，我也让他全神贯注。

examination_example.sentence: I expected that one toy would keep his <highlight>attention</highlight> for about five minutes, ten minutes, max.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我期望一个玩具能让他集中注意力大约5分钟，最多10分钟。

立正姿势; [军队指令]立正

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸引注意力；吸引关注；引起注意

sense_info_list.en: interest that people show in someone or something
sense_info_list.zh: 兴趣; 关注; 注意(力)

examination_example.sentence: The nurse's action caught the <highlight>attention</highlight> of the doctor on duty that day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 护士的举动引起了当天值班医生的注意。

examination_example.sentence: All the students have to pay <highlight>attention</highlight> to the pronunciation of each word.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有学生都必须注意每个单词的发音。

examination_example.sentence: AI's recent developments have got a lot of social <highlight>attention</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人工智能近来的发展引起了社会的广泛关注。

word_usage.usage: attention在表示“注意”时，为不可数名词。用作可数名词时，指具体活动，表示“殷勤”“关心”，多用复数形式。
表示“注意某人或某事”，可用固定搭配pay attention to。to为介词，其后可直接加宾语，也可加动名词。

表示“要某人注意某事”，可用call/draw one's attention to sth 或call sth to one's attention；表示“用某事引起某人的注意”时，用bring the matter to one's attention。两者不可调换使用。
正 He wants to call her attention to the matter.
误 He wants to bring her attention to the matter.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指认真地听、看、思考等时的专注。
指对所见、所闻的人或事物作出的反应，侧重结果。
常用于take note (of sth.) 结构中，以表示注意到某事物并将其铭记在心。
